client.model.interfaces
Interface ClientLocal

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client
public interface ClientLocal

Interface for the client itself to interact with the Server

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getNickname()
          Getter-Method for the nickname of the client.
 boolean isConnected()
          Checks if the client is connected to the server.
 boolean printHistory()
          Makes client receive all the messages that were sent to the server before.
 boolean register()
          Registers the client on the server Uses remote server-object to add itself (reduced to the methods listed in the remote-interface) to the client-list.
 boolean send(java.lang.String text)
          Sends a String as message to all the clients connected to the server.
 void setNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
          Setter-Method for the nickname of the client.
 boolean unregister()
          Unregisters the client from the server Uses remote server-object to remove itself from the client-list.
 

Method Detail

register

boolean register()
Registers the client on the server Uses remote server-object to add itself (reduced to the methods listed in the remote-interface) to the client-list.

Returns:

unregister

boolean unregister()
Unregisters the client from the server Uses remote server-object to remove itself from the client-list.

Returns:

send

boolean send(java.lang.String text)
Sends a String as message to all the clients connected to the server. Creates as message object from the String. Uses remote server-object to broadcast this message to the other clients.

Parameters:
text -
Returns:

printHistory

boolean printHistory()
Makes client receive all the messages that were sent to the server before. Uses remote server-object to get a list of the messages. Makes the local client receive each of these messages.

Returns:

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Checks if the client is connected to the server. When client connects/disconnects to a server, a boolean variable is set true/false, this variable is checked by this method.

Returns:

getNickname

java.lang.String getNickname()
Getter-Method for the nickname of the client.

Returns:

setNickname

void setNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
Setter-Method for the nickname of the client.

Parameters:
nickname -
